remarks: If a word represents a closed walk of length at least 2 in a undirected simple graph, the first two symbols of the word must be different. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 17-Jun-2018.)
statement: usg2cwwk2dif $p |- ( ( V USGrph E /\ N e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ W e. ( ( V ClWWalksN E ) ` N ) ) -> ( W ` 1 ) =/= ( W ` 0 ) ) $.
